question: Ini adalah pernyataan, pertanyaan, atau frasa yang memiliki makna ganda, diajukan sebagai teka-teki yang harus dipecahkan. Itulah definisi .... tolong jawabb​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Riddle

Penjelasan:

Riddle, atau teka-teki adalah pernyataan atau pertanyaan atau frasa yang memiliki makna ganda atau terselubung, diajukan sebagai teka-teki yang harus dipecahkan.

related_questions.question:
This text is for question numbers 14-17    My Neighbour
Mr. And Mrs. Ruslan are my neighbors. They have two children,
a son and a daughter. Their names are Fahril and Mayada. Mr. Ruslan is a lecturer in
a state university in our town. Mrs. Ruslanis a house wife. She likes cooking many kinds
of food. She often invites me to cook together in her kitchen. Mr. Ruslan's family has some
pets. There are some birds, a cat and two rabits. I sometimes feed them. I like guing there
because they are kind and friendly. They always show good attitude to everyone.
14. Does Ruslan's family live far from the writer's house?
a. Yes, they do
c. Yes, it does
b. No, they do not
d. No, it doesn't
15. Where does Mr. Ruslan work? He works in a.....
a. University
c. kitchen
b. school
d. company
16. I sometimes feed them. The underlined word means.......
a. ask food to somebody or something
b.give food to somebody or something
C. eat food with somebody
d. take food froom somebody
17. " she ofteninvites me to cook together in her kitchen."The word "me" refers to.....
a, the teacher
c. Mayada
c. the writer
d. Mr. Ruslan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

14. b

15. a

16. b

17. c

Penjelasan:

i'm not sure about number 14, i'm sorry

related_questions.question:
13. Penguapan pada tumbuhan    disebut juga
transpirasi
b. kondensasi
c. evaporasi
d. revitalisasi
tolong di jawab plis

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. transpirasi

Peristiwa berubahnya air menjadi uap dan bergerak dari permukaan tanah dan permukaan air ke udara disebut evaporasi (penguapan). Peristiwa penguapan dari tanaman disebut transpirasi. Kedua-duanya bersama-sama disebut Evapotranspirasi.

sumber:

https://ekaratnawati2492.wordpress.com/2012/11/14/transpirasi-pada-tumbuhan-2/#:~:text=Peristiwa%20berubahnya%20air%20menjadi%20uap%20dan%20bergerak%20dari,Evapotranspirasi.%20I.%20Kegunaan%20dan%20kerugian%20transpirasi%20terhadap%20tumbuhan.

semoga membantu!

related_questions.question:
25. Pram: "What are we going to do after work?"    Yuni : "We can have dinner at the plaza at 7 if you
like."
Pram: "Sounds good. I'll pick you up at 6.30. We
need half an hour to get there.
Where will they probably be at six forty-five?
A. At the Plaza.
B. In the office.
C. Still at work.
D. On the way to the Plaza
E. They will meet at Plaza​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D

Penjelasan:

Arti

Pram : "Apa yang akan kita lakukan setelah selesai bekerja?"

Yuni :"Kita bisa makan malam di plaza jam 7 jika kamu mau"

Pram :"Baiklah. Aku akan menjemputmu pada jam 6.30. kita butuh setengah jam untuk sampai kesana."

karena untuk sampai ke Plaza kira kira pada jam 7. Maka pada saat jam 6.45, mereka masih otw ke plaza.

Jadi jawabannya adalah D
